Name: Mary Makes It Easy
Title: Sandwich Bored
Desc: Mary thinks that sandwich possibilities are endless; Tuna Niçoise sandwich; a French Riviera salad.
LongDescription: Mary believes that sandwich possibilities are endless; never get bored with her stacked recipe lineup, like the Tuna Niçoise sandwich; a French Riviera salad staple thrown onto crusty ciabatta; the classic charcuterie board on a bun.
